DOC.criteria: 1 . Age ≥ 60 ≤ 79 year 2 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 20 ≤ 35 kg/m2 . 3 . Short Physical Performance Battery ( SPPB ) score > 9 ( fully functional mobility limitation ) . 4 .
